title: Strike While the Iron Is Hot!
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Man, I want to go on an adventure~. Hey, Mari-san, can we go to somewhere like Mount Everest with your helicopter?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>What!? That would be a tough one~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Hmm, then, how about the Great Wall of China!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>That’s not a distance we can cover with a heli~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Where can you go adventuring with a heli then?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Let’s see…. How about the highlands? Umi came to play at my villa the other day<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Eeh-!? Really!? Umi-chan didn’t say anything about going anywhere besides the mountains~. I want to go to your villa too! I want to have a barbecue at your villa!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Wow, that’s a nice idea♪ Then shall we go right now?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>R-, right now!? Isn’t that too sudden!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Don’t underestimate the speed of the Ohara family’s heli! I’ll send you back home by the end of the day, so let’s strike while the iron is hot~! Go~~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
